Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. It's worth more than $100 to us, and I believe it could be a valuable asset to you as well. Considering its quality and benefits, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a reasonable discount. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
